MATH GAME INSTRUCTIONS: //n
Math game will display an equation and using the displayed buttons you must enter the answer and then press submit. If you answered the question correctly you will receive a point. An incorrect answer receives no points. If you answer 3 incorrectly you lose a life. There are 10 rounds total so if you have less than 3 incorrect answers you will win the game.
FLASH GAME INSTRUCTIONS: //n
If you still have lives remaining after playing math game, you will be taken to flash colours game. There, you press start and a pattern of colours will appear. Your goal is to remember the pattern and then click the corresponding colour buttons to the pattern you saw. If you identified the pattern correctly, a message will appear saying you were correct and you will be awarded a point. If you identify 2 patterns incorrectly, you will lose the flash colours game and you will lose a life. A total of 4 rounds will be played.
ROCK PAPER SCISSORS GAME INSTRUCTIONS: //n
If you have more than 0 lives left after playing Flash Colours game, you will be taken to Rock Paper Scissors game. You can click the rock button, paper button or the scissors button based on what you want to use for this round. Then you will be taken to a screen that tells you if you won playing against the computer of not. If you win 3 rounds before losing 2, you will win the Rock Paper Scissors game.
BONUS INSTRUCTIONS: //n
After every game you will be taken to a spinner that has the power to increase your multiplier which inevitably multiplies your points. There are also multiple hidden features throughout the games that can also increase your multiplier so good luck!
